casebody.data:
WARD
v.
FLOORS PERFECT, et al. No. 339A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 5, 2007. Zachary C. Bolen, Raleigh, for Floors Perfect, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of September 2007 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (David Ward) shall have up to and including the 24th day of October 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of September 2007."
